Html: Hi, I tried to download the Harvard style for my word 2007. But, it does not run as an application. It opens in the Win RAR file. I do not know how to run this file . please help me. thank You

All style files on this site are either zip-archives or pure xslt files. In case of zip-archives (which will open with WinRAR) you have to extract the content to the correct directory.

To locate the correct directory, see http://bibword.codeplex.com/releases/view/15852
